game.name: PANICORE
game.categories: Single-player, Multi-player, Co-op, Online Co-op, Steam Achievements, Steam Cloud, Family Sharing
game.shortDescription: [패니코어]는 퍼마데스, AI 몬스터, 협동 플레이를 혼합한 서바이벌 호러 게임입니다. 잡히지 않고 탈출해야 하지만, 몬스터들은 여러분의 발자국 소리뿐만 아니라 목소리도 들을 수 있으니 주의하세요.
game.shortDescriptionEn: PANICORE is a survival horror game that mixes permadeath, AI monsters and a co-op experience up to 5 players (4 players in demo). Try to escape and don't get caught, but beware: they don't only hear your steps, but also your voice.
